relatedAITools.heading: Related AI Tools

items.question: What level of video quality and duration can I anticipate?
items.answer: The Premium model produces stunning high-definition 3D videos, whereas the Quick model provides standard quality, optimizing for speed. Both deliver professional-grade results ideal for e-commerce and marketing.

items.question: Can I adjust the movement and effects of the video?
items.answer: Absolutely! You have complete control over the motion through natural prompts, allowing you to define any camera movement or action and enabling the AI to apply realistic dynamics.

items.question: Which image formats work best for generating 3D videos?
items.answer: Clear product images on simple backgrounds yield the best results, with JPG, PNG, and WebP formats all supported. Ensure images are high-resolution and well-lit for optimal output.

items.question: How is this different from simple animation tools?
items.answer: Our AI technology introduces genuine 3D motion which simulates realistic physical actions and transitions, setting it apart from basic slide animation with static images.

items.question: Can I enhance the video quality post-creation?
items.answer: Yes, utilize our upscaling tools to enhance AI-generated videos, improving resolution and clarity for no extra cost. This is especially effective when pairing models.

items.question: What is the pricing structure for video generation?
items.answer: WaveSpeed follows a pay-as-you-go model with no hidden fees. You only pay for the videos actually created, with no commitments for minimum purchases.

items.question: What is the typical video generation time and can I produce multiple at once?
items.answer: Video generation is swift, typically achieved within 1-2 minutes, with batch processing available for simultaneous creation of multiple videos.

items.question: What are optimal use cases for 3D video technology?
items.answer: This technology excels in product showcases for online retail, dynamic social media content, engaging marketing videos, and any area needing visually compelling material.

items.question: Will I own the commercial rights to my videos?
items.answer: Yes, all videos produced grant full commercial rights, allowing unlimited use across platforms without additional fees or royalties.

items.question: What support resources are available for users?
items.answer: WaveSpeed offers extensive support via documentation, tutorials, and customer service for technical assistance, ensuring a seamless user experience.
